Class RaterDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • RaterDatabase

  • public class RaterDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a "database" for raters. Here any rater can be acessed efficiently using HashMap after loading the .CSV into the memory of the computer. All methods are static.
    Version:
    06/09/2021
    Author:
    Rafael Zuolo Coppini Lima

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RaterDatabase()

      static void addRaterRating(java.lang.String raterID, java.lang.String movieID, double rating)
      Add a single rating from a rater.
      static void addRatings(java.lang.String filename)
      Add the .CSV database named "filename" in the memory.
      static void dumpCurrentDatabase(java.lang.String filename)
      NOT IMPLEMENTED: print a CSV of the current raters loaded
      static Rater getRater(java.lang.String id)
      Return the rater with ID id.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Rater> getRaters()
      return a list of all raters current loaded
      static void initialize(java.lang.String filename)
      Load the .CSV database named "filename" in the memory.
      static int size()
      Return the number of raters loaded.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RaterDatabase

        public RaterDatabase()

    • Method Detail

      • addRaterRating

        public static void addRaterRating(java.lang.String raterID,
                                  java.lang.String movieID,
                                  double rating)
        Add a single rating from a rater. If it's the first rating of this rater, load him to the memory.

      • addRatings

        public static void addRatings(java.lang.String filename)
        Add the .CSV database named "filename" in the memory. If the database is not initialized, initialize it with the current filename. Else add more data to the current database.

      • dumpCurrentDatabase

        public static void dumpCurrentDatabase(java.lang.String filename)
        NOT IMPLEMENTED: print a CSV of the current raters loaded

      • getRater

        public static Rater getRater(java.lang.String id)
        Return the rater with ID id.

      • getRaters

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Rater> getRaters()
        return a list of all raters current loaded

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(java.lang.String filename)
        Load the .CSV database named "filename" in the memory.

      • size

        public static int size()
        Return the number of raters loaded.
